posts.title: Website
posts.content: Sooooo I created this website. I personally think it's finished. When I get more experience I'll prolly add like a resume or projects section, but for now this is prolly where the development of this site stops lol. This was fun :DDDD

posts.title: Oops
posts.content: So I found out about page speed insights by Google, and I kinda maybe sorta decided to test the websites loading speed. So it turns out it was shit, so I decided to make the websites loading speed faster, and it worked so I'm happy. Oh and not only that but I also added some fading animations to make tab switching and the art gallery feel smoother. By the way if the website looks weird in your end, try pressing CTRL+F5, it should fix the websites problems :>
